actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the operation on property of the Department of Defense of certain vehicles designed, developed, manufactured, or supplied by persons owned by, controlled by, or subject to the jurisdiction of a foreign entity of concern, and for other purposes.
short_title: Protecting Military Bases from Connected Vehicles of Concern Act of 2025

titles.title: Protecting Military Bases from Connected Vehicles of Concern Act of 2025
Protecting Military Bases from Connected Vehicles of Concern Act of 2025

A bill to prohibit the operation on property of the Department of Defense of certain vehicles designed, developed, manufactured, or supplied by persons owned by, controlled by, or subject to the jurisdiction of a foreign entity of concern, and for other purposes.
